import '../styles/tour-details.css' import React, {useRef, useState} from 'react' import { Container,Row,Col,Form,ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' import avatar from "../assets/images/avatar.jpg" import Booking from '../components/Booking/Booking' import Newsletter from '../shared/Newsletter' import useFetch from './../hooks/useFetch' import { BASE_URL} from './../utils/config' const TourDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams() const reviewMsgRef = useRef() const [tourRating, setTourRating] = useState(null) const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true) // Ensure id is valid before making the API call const { data: tour, error } = useFetch(`${BASE_URL}/tours/${id}`) // If tour data is loading or there's an error, show loading message or error useEffect(() => { if (tour) { setIsLoading(false) } }, [tour]) if (isLoading) return

Loading...

if (error) return

Error: {error}

// Destructure the tour data safely const { photo, title, desc, price, reviews, address, city, distance, maxGroupSize } = tour || {} const { totalRating, avgRating } = calculateAvgRating(reviews) const options = { day: "numeric", month: "long", year: "numeric" } // Handle review submission const submitHandler = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() const reviewText = reviewMsgRef.current.value // Add review logic here (e.g., send to backend) if (reviewText && tourRating) { const review = { text: reviewText, rating: tourRating, date: new Date().toLocaleDateString("en-US", options) } // Assume you're sending this review to the backend // const res = await fetch(`${BASE_URL}/tours/${id}/reviews`, { method: 'POST', body: JSON.stringify(review) }) console.log("Review submitted:", review) } else { alert("Please provide a rating and review text.") } } return <>

{title}

{avgRating=== 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ("Not rated") : ( ({reviews?.length}) )} {address}
{city} ${price} /per person {distance} k/m {maxGroupSize} people
Description

{desc}

{/*============== tour review section ============== */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

setTourRating(1)}> 1 setTourRating(2)} > 2 setTourRating(3)} > 3 setTourRating(4)} > 4 setTourRating(5)} > 5
{ reviews?.map(reviews=> (
Pranta

{new Date("12-1-2024").toLocaleDateString( "en-US", options )}

5
Amazing tour
) ) }
{/*============== tour review section end ============== */}
} export default TourDetails
